contribution.comment: I put as much effort and time as I could for this project. I consider that I helped with everything a bit, software and hardware for our game project as stated when diving tasks.

Communication was great. He helped a lot with all the project implementation (software and hardware). He is an excellent member for a group with leadership and great quality of work. Went above expectations.

Communication was great. He contributed a lot with assigned software and hardware features for the game. He always achieved his tasks on time. High quality work that impressed me. He was a good problem solver for our group.
Communication was great. He participated in all group discussions about progress and updates on the software and hardware parts of the project. Good work quality as expected.
